title: Did the police "take a knee " and leave the Redskins Hotel, which was beaten at night in their room?
subtitle: No, the police did not block the football team in the dressing room after a match against Philadelphia Eagles (or any other team).
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Washington Redskins was arrested in their lockers at night by the angry Philadelphia police that the players "take a knee" during a game against the Eagles on October 23, 2017.
